mapper.insert: insert into reply (board_id, writer, content,update_date,delete_date) values (#{boardNo},#{writer},#{content},#{updateDate},#{deleteDate})
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content}, update_date = NOW() where reply_id=#{id};
mapper.select: select count(*),likes from reply where reply_id=#{id};
select count(*),dislikes from reply where reply_id=#{id};
